pages.text: The $(item)Dragon Egg$() is a trophy item, and is the $(n)rarest$() item obtainable in the game, as it generates only once per world. $(br2)It's generated on top of the exit portal when the first $(l:creatures/boss-ender_dragon)$(thing)Ender Dragon$() is defeated.

The egg usually cannot be mined directly, as trying to do so causes it to teleport. $(br2)The $(item)Dragon Egg$() is a gravity-affected block, and drops as an item when pushed by a $(l:redstone/redstone_components#piston)$(item)Piston$() or when it falls onto a block less than a full block tall, such as a $(item)Torch$() or a $(item)Bottom Slab$(). $(br2)When destroyed by an explosion, the block always drops as an item.
